title: Joe's Jeans Women's Mia
features: Made in the USA or Imported

TRENDY JEANS FOR WOMEN: Chic and comfy, our Mia High-Rise Wide-Leg Jeans deliver all-season style. The flattering rise provides effortless confidence, while the wide leg length is ideal to dress up or keep casual for any occasion.

STRETCHY APPEAL: These comfortable jeans pair well with any outfit. They feature a high rise with ease of stretch up top to hug curves from front to back while effortlessly achieving a relaxed, flared silhouette down at the bottom.

ELEVATED STYLE & QUALITY: These women’s high-waisted jeans are made from a high-quality fabric blend that provides all-day style and lasting comfort. They are crafted with a button closure and 5-pocket design and are available in different hem styles.

EASY CARE: A unique cut and high-quality materials make these fashionable flare stretch jeans for women a go-to wardrobe staple. Simply machine wash them on a gentle setting with mild soap to keep them looking great.

BE AUTHENTIC: Founded in 2001 with inherent LA sensibility and a rock ’n’ roll point of view, Joe’s Jeans redefines everyday style with jeans that combine the perfect fit, comfort, and quality with timeless and trendy good looks.
description: With stretch and statement-making flare, our Mia High-Rise Wide-Leg Jeans combine style and comfort. They can go from a casual day with friends to a night on the town with ease. Our signature designer high-rise jeans have a perfect fit that looks great no matter where you wear them. These jeans create a confident look and are designed to flatter any shape without sacrificing comfort.Made from a high-quality fabric blend, the Mia jeans offer all-day comfort and a unique wide-leg fit. They also feature a zipper fly, a button closure, an 11 1/2-inch high-rise waist, and a 23-inch leg opening with 5 classic-style pockets and a belt-loop waistband. The high-rise style hugs curvy waists comfortably and pairs well with the wide fit of the legs to create a trendy, attractive, and balanced profile. Available in multiple sizes, hem styles, and washes, these wide-leg jeans for women are machine washable for elevated, long-lasting style in any wardrobe.Joe’s Jeans delivers trendy, timeless denim for men and women with the latest technology and highest-quality materials to create beautiful jeans with a flawless fit.
